name: Copper
overview: A very exciting, all machine code action game. Chase your criminal up through the scaffold, frantically collecting LOOT on the way, avoiding barrels rolling down on you thrown by the henchmen on each level. The higher you get the narrower the scaffol gets. A very fast and furious game... hyper-addictive... that will leave you breathless. 255 speeds... 10 skill levels... top ten score table.
